segments.text: Excuse me . I was wondering how to order office supplies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a requisition form on the company web site . What type of supplies do you need ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need paper , ink cartridges , and paper clips .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How quickly will you need your supplies ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need all of my supplies right away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We also will have to check your department budget . Do you know how much money you have for office supplies ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will check to see what my budget is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like these supplies delivered or would you like to pick them up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please deliver them to my office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , well just send the form to us and we will let you know as soon as your supplies come in . Have a good day !
segments.speaker: S2
